data.title: Who is Eminem’s ex-wife Kim Scott? – The Sun
data.meta_description: IN the late 90s and early 00s you'd be hard to find someone who DIDN'T know who Kim Scott was, thanks to her tumultuous relationship with rapper Emine
data.text:
IN the late 90s and early 00s you'd be hard to find someone who DIDN'T know who Kim Scott was, thanks to her tumultuous relationship with rapper Eminem.

In August 2021, it was reported she had attempted to take her own life.

Who is Eminem's ex-wife Kim Scott?

Kimberly is the ex-wife of Eminem.

Their rocky relationship was well documented in the 90s and early noughties.

The 47-year0old was born January 9, 1975, in a tough part of Michigan.

Her twin sister tragically died of a heroin overdose in 2016.

Where is Kim Scott now?

What Kim does for work is unknown, however, she does have an estimated worth of around £1.5M.

This is believed to be mainly from her former marriage to Eminem.

A long way from her poor Michigan origins, she now lives in an impressive home in the suburbs of Macomb, Michigan.

In 2016 Kim was the subject of a cruel death hoax.

On August 11, 2021, it was reported that Kim had been rushed to hospital after "attempting to take her own life".

Cops rushed to 47-year-old Kim's home in Michigan after receiving reports of a suicidal person, TMZ claimed.

Kim and Eminem were childhood sweethearts.

They met in 1987 when both were just teenagers.

The couple began a romance that would last through the '90s, resulting in the birth of their daughter,

Hailie, in 1995.

The pair had an on/off romance and by 2007, they'd already married and divorced twice.

Where is the current relationship between Eminem and his daughter Hailie?

Hailie Mathers showed up at the Super Bowl LVI on February 13, 2022, with her sister Alaina to support their dad's performance during the halftime show.

Eminem performed alongside other veteran musicians such as Mary J Blige, Dr. Dre, Snoop Dogg, 50 Cent, and Kendrick Lamar.
